2000.context: Qualys, Inc. is a cloud security and compliance company focused on vulnerability management, compliance, and web app security. Founded for vulnerability scanning as a service.

competitors.name: Internet Security Systems (ISS)
competitors.notes: Early vulnerability scanning competitor

competitors.name: Nessus
competitors.notes: One of the first vulnerability scanners, open-source project started 1998

2005.context: Qualys, Inc. is a cloud security and compliance company focused on vulnerability management, compliance, and web app security. SaaS security pioneer. Compliance automation.

competitors.name: Internet Security Systems (ISS)
competitors.notes: Major player in vulnerability management and intrusion detection. ISS was a leading security vendor in 2005, offering vulnerability assessment and network security solutions before being acquired by IBM in 2006.

competitors.name: Symantec
competitors.notes: Large security vendor offering vulnerability management as part of broader security and data management portfolio. Following the 2005 Veritas merger, Symantec became a comprehensive security provider.

competitors.name: Nessus (Tenable)
competitors.notes: Widely-used vulnerability scanner that competed directly with Qualys' vulnerability scanning capabilities. Nessus was established as a leading vulnerability assessment tool, initially open-source before commercialization.

competitors.name: McAfee
competitors.notes: Security vendor with vulnerability assessment and management capabilities as part of comprehensive security solutions.

competitors.name: IBM
competitors.notes: Enterprise security vendor offering vulnerability assessment tools and network security solutions, strengthened by the 2006 ISS acquisition.

2010.context: Qualys, Inc. is a cloud security and compliance company focused on vulnerability management, compliance, and web app security. Cloud platform expansion. PCI compliance.

competitors.name: Tenable/Nessus
competitors.notes: Direct competitor with on-premises deployment vs Qualys cloud approach

competitors.name: Rapid7/Nexpose
competitors.notes: Vulnerability management with on-premises capability

competitors.name: OpenVAS
competitors.notes: Open-source vulnerability scanner, free alternative

competitors.name: McAfee
competitors.notes: Major security vendor with vulnerability assessment

competitors.name: Tripwire
competitors.notes: Security configuration and vulnerability management provider

2015.context: Qualys, Inc. is a cloud security and compliance company focused on vulnerability management, compliance, and web app security. Cloud security and container scanning.

competitors.name: Tenable
competitors.notes: Direct competitor with Nessus vulnerability scanner and Nexpose (later InsightVM). Tenable competed strongly with both on-premises and cloud-based vulnerability management solutions, known for extensive CVE coverage.

competitors.name: Rapid7
competitors.notes: Competitor in vulnerability management and penetration testing with Nexpose product and Metasploit framework. Rapid7 offered data security and analytics solutions including vulnerability management, incident detection, and response.

competitors.name: Symantec (Broadcom)
competitors.notes: Security vendor offering cloud penetration testing and vulnerability management capabilities as part of comprehensive security solutions.

competitors.name: IBM
competitors.notes: Enterprise security provider with vulnerability management capabilities through ISS acquisition, competing in the enterprise vulnerability assessment market.

competitors.name: OpenVAS
competitors.notes: Open-source vulnerability scanner and manager, presenting a free alternative to Qualys' commercial cloud-based offerings.

competitors.name: Micro Focus
competitors.notes: Security vendor offering vulnerability management and security solutions for enterprise customers.

2020.context: Qualys, Inc. is a cloud security and compliance company focused on vulnerability management, compliance, and web app security. Multi-vector EDR. VMDR platform.

competitors.name: Tenable Holdings
competitors.notes: Direct competitor with on-premises and cloud options

competitors.name: Rapid7
competitors.notes: Data security and analytics with vulnerability management

competitors.name: Positive Technologies
competitors.notes: Main competitor in vulnerability assessment

competitors.name: Lacework
competitors.notes: Cloud security platform competitor

competitors.name: Checkmarx
competitors.notes: Application security testing competitor

competitors.name: CrowdStrike
competitors.notes: Endpoint detection and response with vulnerability features

competitors.name: Microsoft Defender for Cloud
competitors.notes: Cloud security with vulnerability scanning

competitors.name: Wiz
competitors.notes: Cloud security platform for cloud environments

competitors.name: Nessus
competitors.notes: Widely used vulnerability scanner by Tenable

competitors.name: OpenVAS
competitors.notes: Open-source vulnerability scanner alternative

2024.context: Qualys, Inc. is a cloud security and compliance company focused on vulnerability management, compliance, and web app security. TotalCloud with AI. Risk-based prioritization.

competitors.name: Tenable
competitors.notes: Direct competitor with Exposure Management Platform, offers on-premises option

competitors.name: Rapid7
competitors.notes: Endpoint-to-cloud security with vulnerability management

competitors.name: CrowdStrike
competitors.notes: EDR with vulnerability management and threat intelligence

competitors.name: Microsoft Defender for Cloud
competitors.notes: Top alternative for Microsoft environments

competitors.name: Wiz
competitors.notes: Cloud security with vulnerability scanning and threat detection

competitors.name: Nessus
competitors.notes: Widely used vulnerability scanner competing directly

competitors.name: Tanium
competitors.notes: Deep endpoint visibility for large networks

competitors.name: BeyondTrust
competitors.notes: Privileged access management with vulnerability assessment

competitors.name: Sophos
competitors.notes: AI-driven threat detection with 24/7 response

competitors.name: Intruder
competitors.notes: Simple yet powerful alternative, easy to maintain

competitors.name: OpenVAS
competitors.notes: Open-source vulnerability scanner, free alternative

2025.context: Qualys, Inc. is a cloud security and compliance company focused on vulnerability management, compliance, and web app security. Cloud security platform. Competing with Tenable, Rapid7.
sources: Note: Web search was temporarily unavailable for Qualys. Competitor information based on general industry knowledge of the 2025 vulnerability management market. For most current information, recommend consulting Gartner Magic Quadrant for Vulnerability Assessment, Forrester Wave reports, or vendor websites directly.

competitors.name: Tenable
competitors.notes: One of the most prominent competitors offering Tenable.io and Nessus, the widely-used vulnerability scanner. Competes directly in vulnerability management and exposure management with comprehensive vulnerability coverage and cloud-based assessment.

competitors.name: Rapid7
competitors.notes: Offers InsightVM (formerly Nexpose) for vulnerability management and risk assessment. Cloud-based platform with live dashboards, risk-based prioritization, and deep integrations into ticketing, CI/CD, and broader Insight platform.

competitors.name: CrowdStrike
competitors.notes: Provides Falcon Spotlight for vulnerability management as part of broader security platform. Endpoint-focused VM built directly into EDR for real-time exposure views and patch status.

competitors.name: Microsoft Defender Vulnerability Management
competitors.notes: Integrated into Microsoft security ecosystem providing vulnerability assessment and management for organizations using Microsoft security stack.

competitors.name: Tanium
competitors.notes: Offers real-time endpoint visibility and vulnerability management with focus on speed and scale across large enterprise environments.

competitors.name: Wiz
competitors.notes: Cloud-native security platform with strong vulnerability management capabilities. Agentless approach for comprehensive visibility across multi-cloud environments, one of fastest-growing CNAPP providers.

competitors.name: Orca Security
competitors.notes: Agentless cloud security platform with vulnerability assessment capabilities. Competes in cloud-native vulnerability management space.

competitors.name: Arctic Wolf
competitors.notes: Managed security services including vulnerability management, offering managed detection and response with vulnerability scanning capabilities.

competitors.name: Sophos
competitors.notes: Provides vulnerability management as part of endpoint protection suite with integrated security capabilities.

competitors.name: Intruder
competitors.notes: Cloud-based vulnerability scanner particularly suited for smaller organizations seeking cost-effective vulnerability management solutions.

mentionedBy.name: Rapid7 Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Cloud-based vulnerability management competitor offering automated vulnerability assessment and compliance solutions.

mentionedBy.name: Rapid7 Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Cloud security platform with compliance and automation

mentionedBy.name: Rapid7 Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Direct competitor in cloud-based vulnerability management with VMDR platform. Qualys offered comprehensive vulnerability detection and response capabilities with extensive detection signature coverage.

mentionedBy.name: Rapid7 Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Cloud-based security with comprehensive VM suite

mentionedBy.name: Rapid7 Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Cloud-based security platform with advanced VMDR (Vulnerability Management, Detection, and Response) solution. Leverages over 150,000 detection signatures, enhancing CVE coverage by 17% compared to Rapid7. Competes directly with InsightVM.

mentionedBy.name: Tenable Holdings Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: One of the 'big three' in vulnerability management, cloud-based platform

mentionedBy.name: Tenable Holdings Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Most direct rival in vulnerability and exposure management, cloud-based platform

mentionedBy.name: Tenable Holdings Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: One of 'big three', cloud-based VM across on-prem, cloud, containers

mentionedBy.name: Tenable Holdings Inc.
mentionedBy.notes: Most direct like-for-like rival in vulnerability and exposure management. Competes with comprehensive cloud-based VMDR platform and extensive vulnerability detection signature coverage.
